thread.title: War medals stolen from WW2 veteran | Meridian
thread.title_full: War medals stolen from WW2 veteran | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: War medals stolen from WW2 veteran | Meridian
text:
The medals were stolen from Geoffrey Blain in December 2016 Credit: Kent Police An appeal, for the return of precious War medals that were stolen from a 94 year old man has been made by police.
The burglary took place at the home of Geoffrey Blain in Rolvenden last December.
Many other items were taken including cash, gold sovereigns and two gold watches.
Seven of the medals had been awarded to Mr Blaine for service during the Second World War and three to his father in the First World War.
The stolen items are important to Mr Blain, they are unique and personal to him, and will be worth more to him than anyone else. They have a history behind them and we are keen to reunite Mr Blain with his medals.
â€“ Detective Constable Jo Heard Some of the medals do have names or regiment numbers on the back and Kent police are asking to be contacted if anyone comes across them.
Last updated Thu 23 Feb 2017 Kent
